xml.name: Completion
xml.Try: By default, completes your code instantly. Start typing .stf right where the caret is, and press EditorEnter to select the sizeToFit() function.
xml.Text: To activate Basic Completion, press CodeCompletion. The lookup menu will display again.
xml.Try: Smart Type Completion filters the list of suggestions to include only those types that are applicable in the current context. Press SmartTypeCompletion to see the list of matching suggestions. Choose the first one by pressing EditorEnter.
Now press CodeCompletion again to show completion options.
Select the singleLine item and press EditorChooseLookupItemReplace (instead of EditorChooseLookupItem). This overwrites the word at the caret rather than simply inserting it.
Now invoke CodeCompletion and EditorChooseLookupItemReplace to easily overwrite animate(withDuration:animations:completion:) with animate(withDuration:animations:)
